All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCard
A splendor card.
Authenticator
This class is used to authenticate all requests made to the Server.
Bank<T>
Generic bank interface to store payment elements.
Board
The board of the game.
Bonus
A set of bonuses mapping colors to integers.
CardSource
This interface represents a source of cards, e.g.
Color
The colors used in the game.
Config
A class for loading configuration files.
Cost
Cost is a map of token colors to integers.
Deck
A deck of splendor cards.
DevelopmentCard
Flyweight class for a development card.
DevelopmentCardI
Interface for a development card.
LogicException
Custom Exception that is fired whenever the logic is instructed to handle parameters that semantically are not applicable.
Noble
Flyweight for a noble card.
PaymentItem
Interface for payment items.
Player
A player in the game.
RequestHelper
This class is used to make requests to the Lobby Service easier.
RestLauncher
This class powers up Spring and ensures the annotated controllers are detected.
SplendorCard
This interface represents a splendor card.
SplendorDeck
This interface separates the deck from a card source.
Test
This class is used for testing purposes.
Token
Flyweight for tokens.
TokenBank
The bank of tokens on the board.
TokenResolver
Copied and adjusted from BoardGamePlatform Project.
